name: Please Do Not Touch That Duck
name_original: Please Do Not Touch That Duck
description:
“The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.” ― F. Scott Fitzgerald

I stopped making games in the last 2 years and decided to start again. Here's a little project I've made in a few hours, just to remember how things worked.
